metaDescription: Juliane Hendershot - Professional Video Editor | Montpellier & Berlin
hero.tagline: Crafting compelling visual stories for brands, documentaries, and digital content with precision and creative flair.
work.label: Portfolio
work.title: Selected Work
work.description: A curated selection of video editing projects spanning documentaries, commercials, and creative content.
about.label: About Me
about.title: Bringing stories to life through video
about.description: With years of experience in video editing, I specialize in creating engaging visual content that captures attention and communicates effectively. From brand videos to documentaries, I bring technical expertise and creative vision to every project.
contact.label: Get in Touch
contact.title: Let's work together
contact.description: Have a project in mind? I'd love to hear about it. Send me a message and let's create something amazing together.
contact.success: Thank you! Your message has been sent. I will get back to you soon.
name: Name
footer.tagline: Professional video editor crafting compelling visual stories for brands and creators.
footer.name: Juliane Hendershot

privacy.embeddedText: Pages on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website. These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction if you have an account and are logged in to that website.
